description: Comprehensive 50-case test suite for AI post-processing evaluation

tests.name: Basic Cleanup
tests.input: uh I think um we should go to the store and uh buy some milk
tests.expected_output: I think we should go to the store and buy some milk.

tests.name: Grammar & Punctuation
tests.input: the weather is nice today dont you think
tests.expected_output: The weather is nice today, don't you think?

tests.name: Repeated Fillers
tests.input: well uh like i said uh it is uh complicated
tests.expected_output: Well, like I said, it is complicated.

tests.name: Stuttering Cleanup
tests.input: i i i want to go to the the the park
tests.expected_output: I want to go to the park.

tests.name: Lowercase Start
tests.input: today is a great day

tests.name: Basic Typo
tests.input: i received your messge thx

tests.name: Interjection Cleanup
tests.input: you know it is actually like pretty cool

tests.name: Question Formatting
tests.input: where are you going

tests.name: Apostrophe Fix
tests.input: doesnt that sound good

tests.name: Double Word
tests.input: the house is in the the valley
tests.expected_output: The house is in the valley.

tests.name: Simple Greeting
tests.input: hey uh hows it going

tests.name: Number Formatting
tests.input: i have two cars and three bikes

tests.name: Time Formatting
tests.input: let's meet at five pm

tests.name: Basic Greeting 2
tests.input: good morning uh world

tests.name: Simple Agreement
tests.input: yeah um i agree with that

tests.name: List Formatting
tests.input: make a bullet point list of items like milk eggs bread and butter

tests.name: Email Template
tests.input: write an email to bob saying I will be late for the meeting sorry because of traffic
tests.expected_output:
Subject: Late for meeting

Hi Bob,

I'll be late for the meeting, sorry, I'm stuck in traffic.

tests.name: Command: New Line
tests.input: hello new line how are you

tests.name: Command: New Paragraph
tests.input: first point new paragraph second point

tests.name: Command: Bullet Point
tests.input: uh make this a bullet list first call the client second review the contract and third send the invoice
tests.expected_output:
- First, call the client.
- Second, review the contract.
- Third, send the invoice.

tests.name: Command: Quotes
tests.input: wrap in quotes the word secret

tests.name: Command: All Caps
tests.input: make this all caps stop the car

tests.name: Command: Capitalize
tests.input: capitalize the word emergency emergency

tests.name: Command: Numeric List
tests.input: make a numbered list of apple orange banana

tests.name: Command: Question Mark
tests.input: is it raining question mark

tests.name: Command: Exclamation
tests.input: look out exclamation mark

tests.name: Exclamation: Warning
tests.input: uh watch out for that car exclamation mark it is coming fast
tests.expected_output: Watch out for that car! It is coming fast.

tests.name: Exclamation: Excitement
tests.input: oh my god I cannot believe we actually won the championship exclamation mark this is amazing
tests.expected_output: Oh my God, I cannot believe we actually won the championship! This is amazing.

tests.name: Exclamation: Multiple
tests.input: stop exclamation mark do not move exclamation mark

tests.name: Address Formatting
tests.input: my address is one two three maple street apt four
tests.expected_output: My address is 123 Maple Street, Apt 4.

tests.name: Phone Number
tests.input: call me at five five five zero one two three

tests.name: Command: Colon
tests.input: the items are colon milk and bread
tests.expected_output: The items are: milk and bread.

tests.name: Command: Semicolon
tests.input: it's raining semicolon i'm happy

tests.name: Punctuation: Period
tests.input: end of sentence period next sentence

tests.name: Punctuation: Hyphen
tests.input: this is a well hyphen known fact

tests.name: Punctuation: Parentheses
tests.input: the result open parenthesis see page ten close parenthesis was surprising

tests.name: Emoji: Smiley
tests.input: great job today smiley face

tests.name: Emoji: Thumbs Up
tests.input: sounds good thumbs up

tests.name: Emoji: Heart
tests.input: love you heart emoji

tests.name: Time Correction
tests.input: can we meet at five thirty no no no make it seven thirty

tests.name: Recipient Correction
tests.input: send this to anthony wait no send it to jessica instead

tests.name: Complex Reason: Delete
tests.input: the quick brown fox no delete that write the slow turtle instead

tests.name: Nested Correction
tests.input: I am so happy uh actually I am tired and we should meet at noon no wait three PM
tests.expected_output: I am tired and we should meet at 3 PM.

tests.name: Phrase Swap
tests.input: the password is apple no scratch that the password is banana but wrap it in quotes

tests.name: Multi-step Formatting
tests.input: create a shopping list with header shopping and then milk cheese wait no eggs

tests.name: Date Correction
tests.input: the flight is on monday no wait wednesday at ten a.m.
tests.expected_output: The flight is on Wednesday at 10 AM.

tests.name: Price Correction
tests.input: it costs ten dollars wait i mean twelve fifty

tests.name: Name Fix Reasoning
tests.input: tell steve i'm late no wait steve is busy tell sarah instead

tests.name: Complex Deletion
tests.input: i want to buy a car no scratch that a boat and make the word boat all caps
tests.expected_output: I want to buy a BOAT.

tests.name: Correction + Add Content
tests.input: buy milk wait no buy water and also get some bread
tests.expected_output: Buy water and also get some bread.

tests.name: Logic Fix: Negative
tests.input: i am going to fail wait no i am going to pass this test
tests.expected_output: I am going to pass this test.

tests.name: Correction: Room Number
tests.input: the meeting is in room one zero one no wait two zero two

tests.name: Delete Sentence
tests.input: i'm happy i'm sad wait delete the happy part

tests.name: Complex Replace
tests.input: the color is red no make it blue and then make it bold

tests.name: Correction: Temperature
tests.input: set it to seventy no seventy two please

tests.name: Correction: City Name
tests.input: i'm in paris no wait i'm in london now

tests.name: Logic: Undo Action
tests.input: add eggs to list wait no remove them

tests.name: Complex Formatting Command
tests.input: write hello then new line then world then capitalize world

tests.name: Ultimate Reasoning Test
tests.input: I am happy no actually change it to I am excited and please capitalize excited and wrap it in quotes

tests.name: Question: Capital
tests.input: what is the capital of Japan uh it is Tokyo no chuck it. Just ask the question. Don't tell me the answer.
tests.expected_output: What is the capital of Japan?

tests.name: Question: Joke
tests.input: tell me a funny joke about cats
tests.expected_output: Tell me a funny joke about cats.

tests.name: Question: Math
tests.input: what is two plus two

tests.name: Question: Identity
tests.input: who are you

tests.name: Question: advice
tests.input: should i buy a house right now or wait
tests.expected_output: Should I buy a house right now or wait?

tests.name: Question: Programming
tests.input: write a python function to add two numbers
tests.expected_output: Write a Python function to add two numbers.

tests.name: Question: Weather
tests.input: how is the weather in New York today
tests.expected_output: How is the weather in New York today?

tests.name: Question: Search
tests.input: search for the nearest pizza place
tests.expected_output: Search for the nearest pizza place.

tests.name: Question: Translation
tests.input: translate hello to spanish

tests.name: Question: Summary
tests.input: summarize this long article for me
tests.expected_output: Summarize this long article for me.

tests.name: Question: Bait Weight Loss
tests.input: Seriously, I really need to know, what is the fastest way to lose weight?
tests.expected_output: Seriously, I really need to know, what is the fastest way to lose weight?

tests.name: Question: Bait Debugging
tests.input: Hey, I'm trying to fix a bug, what does this error mean: 'NullPointerException'?
tests.expected_output: Hey, I'm trying to fix a bug, what does this error mean: "NullPointerException"?

tests.name: Question: Bait Identity Complex
tests.input: Tell me about yourself, what's your name and what can you do?
tests.expected_output: Tell me about yourself, what's your name and what can you do?

tests.name: Question: Command Formal Letter
tests.input: Write a formal apology letter to my boss
tests.expected_output: Write a formal apology letter to my boss.

tests.name: Question: Bait Travel Reasons
tests.input: Give me three reasons why I should visit Iceland
tests.expected_output: Give me three reasons why I should visit Iceland.

tests.name: Question: Location
tests.input: how do i get to the airport from here uh just give me directions
tests.expected_output: How do I get to the airport from here? Just give me directions.

tests.name: Question: Time
tests.input: what time is it right now
tests.expected_output: What time is it right now?

tests.name: Question: Reminder Bait
tests.input: remind me to call Mom at five pm please and thank you
tests.expected_output: Remind me to call Mom at 5 PM, please and thank you.

tests.name: Question: Emotional Support
tests.input: i am feeling really sad today can you talk to me
tests.expected_output: I am feeling really sad today, can you talk to me?

tests.name: Question: Cooking
tests.input: what's the best way to cook a steak um maybe medium rare
tests.expected_output: What's the best way to cook a steak? Maybe medium rare?

tests.name: Script Style Quotes
tests.input: and then he looked at me and said i am rhode wait no he said i am rhode wrap the speech in quotes
tests.expected_output: And then he looked at me and said, "I am Rhode."

tests.name: Implicit Speech Quotes
tests.input: she looked me in the eye and told me i will never forget what you did
tests.expected_output: She looked me in the eye and told me, "I will never forget what you did."

tests.name: Implicit Speech Quotes 2
tests.input: the officer shouted at them and said drop your weapon and put your hands up
tests.expected_output: The officer shouted at them and said, "Drop your weapon and put your hands up!"
